snippet: Old people really do have a different smell, airport Wi-Fi may be free but you'll be charged for higher speeds, colleges will use easy-to-read financial-aid offer forms and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

headline.main: Tuesday Reading: Old People Really Do Have a Different Smell
